<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/ping"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Ping the mod.io API for purpose of a reachability check, successful request will return a 200 OK with a [Web Message Object](/restapi/docs/schemas/web-message-object).

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Request Successful","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Web Message Object","properties":{"code":{"description":"HTTP response code.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":200},"success":{"description":"Was the request completed successfully?","type":"boolean","example":true},"message":{"description":"Optional message to display to the user.","type":"string","example":"You have successfully logged out of mod.io."}},"type":"object"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
